General.Name: Companhia de Saneamento do Paraná - SANEPAR
General.Description: Companhia de Saneamento do Paraná - SANEPAR provides sanitation services in Brazil. The company is involved in the water treatment and distribution; and collection and treatment of sewage and solid waste, as well as study, project, and construction work of facilities. It also offers advisory and technical assistance services for related activities. The company provides sanitary services in 325 municipalities of Paraná and Santa Catarina. It serves federal, state, municipal agencies, and other entities. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Curitiba, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Engenheiros Reboucas, 1376, Curitiba, PR, Brazil, 80215-900
